vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in Reentrance.withdrawBalance (patch_8.sol#15-24):
	External calls:
	- ! (msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)()) (patch_8.sol#20-22)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- locked (patch_8.sol#23)
